Text: dandalis is correct, but not very helpful. The picture is great, but during the rip, audio gain was too high and caused clipping. There are several blank spots in the audio as well. I already seeded to a 4:1 ratio before I watched this. Considering I got this free, I enjoyed it. aliibhatti I do believe you need to invest in a more powerful system to avoid NON-constructive comments. Your efforts are appreciated, thanks.
